name: Oleander Resort DEMO
description:
After waking up in a mysterious hotel with no visible way out, 16-year-old Yuto Ryuno is greeted with many unfamiliar faces- and maybe a few familiar ones as well. Together, they race against time to find the exit… but every night at midnight, in a horrifying game of luck, the sadistic game-master picks them off one by one.

Why are they here? Who is the person who hates each and every one of them enough to kill them?

And can everyone around Yuto really be trusted?

MASSIVE THANKS TO:

Our artists, Letter, Nate, and Rin, for helping to put together the visual aspects of this game!

Our musicians, Lime, De, and Slans for their awesome auditory work!

Sanguine for giving you that lovely evil laugh, as well as the cast of VAs that will be featured in the finished product!

And my co-director and partner, for putting up with my BS.

Visit castingcall.club/projects/oleander-resort to view their details!!

Official Discord: discord.gg/Mb4wUVFnaB

Sound effects from freesfx

Enjoy the show!
